ne14:6.3: Kā ca pakatikathāya desanā, cattāri saccāni.
ne14:6.5: “idaṃ dukkhan”ti ayaṃ paññatti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ channaṃ dhātūnaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ dasannaṃ indriyānaṃ nikkhepapaññatti.
ne14:7.1: Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ.
ne14:7.2: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
ne14:7.3: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.
ne14:7.4: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
ne14:7.5: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.
ne14:7.6: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, sasokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, sadaraṃ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
ne14:8.4: Viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ.
ne14:8.5: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
ne14:8.6: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.
ne14:8.7: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
ne14:8.8: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.
ne14:8.9: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, sasokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, sadaraṃ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
ne14:8.10: Ayaṃ pabhavapaññatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa ca.
ne14:9.1: Kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo natthi nandī natthi taṇhā, appatiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ.
ne14:9.2: Yattha appatiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
ne14:9.3: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.
ne14:9.4: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
ne14:9.5: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.
ne14:9.6: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, asokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, adaraṃ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.
ne14:10.4: Viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo natthi nandī natthi taṇhā, appatiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ.
ne14:10.5: Yattha appatiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ avirūḷhaṃ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
ne14:10.6: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.
ne14:10.7: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
ne14:10.8: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.
ne14:10.9: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, asokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, adaraṃ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.
ne14:11.1: Ayaṃ pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
ne14:12.2: Appamatto nipako sato, samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ne14:12.5: “Rūpā aniccā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti “cakkhuviññāṇaṃ aniccan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ne14:12.7: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi aniccanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ne14:13.10: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi aniccanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ne14:14.1: Ayaṃ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
ne14:15.1: Rūpaṃ, rādha, vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṃsetha vikīḷaniyaṃ karotha, paññāya taṇhakkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
ne14:15.6: saṅkhāre viññāṇaṃ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṃsetha vikīḷaniyaṃ karotha, paññāya taṇhakkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
ne14:16.1: Ayaṃ nirodhapaññatti nirodhassa, nibbidāpaññatti assādassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti nirodhassa.
ne14:17.1: “So idaṃ dukkhan”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ne14:18.1: Ayaṃ paṭivedhapaññatti saccānaṃ, nikkhepapaññatti dassanabhūmiyā, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, sacchikiriyāpaññatti sotāpattiphalassa.
ne14:18.2: “So ime āsavā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ āsavasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, “ayaṃ āsavanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
ne14:19.1: Ayaṃ uppādapaññatti khaye ñāṇassa, okāsapaññatti anuppāde ñāṇassa, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, pariññāpaññatti dukkhassa, pahānapaññatti samudayassa, ārambhapaññatti vīriyindriyassa, āhaṭanāpaññatti āsāṭikānaṃ, nikkhepapaññatti bhāvanābhūmiyā, abhinighātapaññatti pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
ne14:20.1: Idaṃ “dukkhan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:20.5: Ayaṃ “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:21.1: Ayaṃ desanāpaññatti saccānaṃ, nikkhepapaññatti sutamayiyā paññāya sacchikiriyāpaññatti anaññātaññassāmītindriyassa, pavattanāpaññatti dhammacakkassa.
ne14:22.1: “Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ pariññeyyan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:22.2: “So kho panāyaṃ dukkhasamudayo pahātabbo”ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ne14:22.4: “so kho panāyaṃ dukkhanirodho sacchikātabbo”ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ne14:22.6: “sā kho panāyaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvetabbā”ti me, bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:23.1: Ayaṃ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, nikkhepapaññatti cintāmayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti aññindriyassa.
ne14:24.1: “Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ pariññātan”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:24.2: “So kho panāyaṃ dukkhasamudayo pahīno”ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ne14:24.4: so kho panāyaṃ dukkhanirodho sacchikato”ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
ne14:24.6: “sā kho panāyaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvitā”ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
ne14:25.1: Ayaṃ bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa, nikkhepapaññatti bhāvanāmayiyā paññāya, sacchikiriyāpaññatti aññātāvino indriyassa, pavattanāpaññatti dhammacakkassa.
ne14:27.8: “Abhindi kavacamivattasambhavan”ti abhinibbidāpaññatti cittassa, upādānapaññatti sabbaññutāya, padālanāpaññatti avijjaṇḍakosānaṃ.
ne14:29.1: “Yo dukkhan”ti vevacanapaññatti ca dukkhassa pariññāpaññatti ca.
ne14:29.4: “Kāmesu so jantu kathaṃ nameyyā”ti vevacanapaññatti ca kāmataṇhāya abhinivesapaññatti ca.
ne14:29.5: “Kāmā hi loke saṅgoti ñatvā”ti paccatthikato dassanapaññatti kāmānaṃ.
ne14:29.6: Kāmā hi aṅgārakāsūpamā maṃsapesūpamā pāvakakappā papātauragopamā ca.
ne14:29.7: “Tesaṃ satīmā”ti apacayapaññatti pahānāya, nikkhepapaññatti kāyagatāya satiyā, bhāvanāpaññatti maggassa.
ne14:29.10: Yadā hi yogī kāmā saṅgoti pajānāti.
ne14:29.11: So kāmānaṃ anuppādāya kusale dhamme uppādayati, so anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya vāyamati.
ne14:29.14: Tattha so uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā vāyamatīti ayaṃ appamādapaññatti bhāvanāya, nikkhepapaññatti vīriyindriyassa, ārakkhapaññatti kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, ṭhitipaññatti adhicittasikkhāya.
ne14:31.3: “Upadhibandhano bālo”ti pabhavapaññatti pāpakānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ, kiccapaññatti pariyuṭṭhānānaṃ.
ne14:31.7: “Assirī viya khāyatī”ti dassanapaññatti dibbacakkhussa, nikkhepapaññatti paññācakkhussa.
ne14:31.8: “Passato natthi kiñcanan”ti paṭivedhapaññatti sattānaṃ, rāgo kiñcanaṃ doso kiñcanaṃ moho kiñcanaṃ.
ne14:32.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, no cetaṃ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ.
ne14:32.2: Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha.
ne14:32.3: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti.
ne14:33.1: “No cetaṃ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatan”ti desanāpaññatti nibbānassa vevacanapaññatti ca.
ne14:33.2: “Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyethā”ti vevacanapaññatti saṅkhatassa upanayanapaññatti ca.
ne14:33.3: “Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatan”ti vevacanapaññatti nibbānassa jotanāpaññatti ca.
ne14:33.4: “Tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti ayaṃ vevacanapaññatti nibbānassa, niyyānikapaññatti maggassa, nissaraṇapaññatti saṃsārato.
ne14:33.6: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “ekaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ, paññattīhi vividhāhi desetī”ti.
